comments.body: Unrelated to your change, but the bitwise OR is a little surprising. Maybe we can rewrite this to be more explicit? Glancing through our code, I don't see any other usages of this operator besides actual bitwise operations.

Yeah. Java is tricky :smile:. Java supports two type of logical operations: one is conditional (`||`), the other is not (`|`). For reference: https://www.dummies.com/programming/java/logical-operators-in-java/
